name: Mirror Room
description:
Tiny VR puzzle escape room game developed for Epic MegaJam 2022!

Hastily solo developed might contain a large amount of squishy bugs.

Credits for art assets used:

VR hand mesh & textures https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/hand-for-vr-bee4147a048e41aeb70158f430178009

Fireplace audio https://opengameart.org/content/fireplace-sound-loop 

Turntable https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/electronics/audio/pick-up-vinyl 

Safe  https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/interior/house-interior/antique-safe-d68...

Numpad mesh https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/electronics/computer/numpad

Red button https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/industrial/other/emergency-stop-button

Lever https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/industrial/tool/cc0-lever

Counting Device https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/architectural/decoration/vintage-abacus

Chandelier https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/interior/living-room/chandelier-brown

Painting textures AI, craiyon.com
